message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You rejected 50/50, now it's my turn to make a move. I'll give you less, but I'll give you a chance to think about it.
You're being greedy, Bob! I'll give you a better chance to take it, but don't expect me to go easy on you!
You're right, I was being greedy. But I'm not going to go easy on you now. This is a more balanced offer, take it or leave it.
You're not getting any more generous, Bob? I'll give you a chance to take it, but I'm not going to get squeezed out completely!
